isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - STARTING ACOM THE FIRST TIME

svcproc.title: STARTING ACOM THE FIRST TIME
svcproc.para: Once installation is complete, ACom is ready for use. While ACom may be started on the computer, most of the functions will be unavailable for use until the Diagnostic Communication Interface (DCI) is connected to the computer and the vehicle. There are some functions that will be available and it's a good idea to start the program just to test the installation.
ACom may be started by double clicking the ACom icon. Refer to Figure 20 for the opening screen.
By obtaining the opening screen it is confirmed that the software has been installed successfully. Proceed to Antilock Diagnostics to see the screens and functions available in ACom.
